report.title: Locations list - Dunescape app
report.description: A list of Dunescape locations formatted for use in the app.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false JOIN cache_termlists_terms t ON t.id=l.location_type_id LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values hab ON hab.location_id=l.id AND hab.deleted=false AND hab.location_attribute_id=263 LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms thab ON thab.id=hab.int_value LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values b ON b.location_id=l.id AND b.deleted=false AND b.location_attribute_id=268 LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values grp ON grp.location_id=l.id AND grp.deleted=false AND grp.location_attribute_id=272 #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND (l.public=true or lw.website_id in (#website_ids#)) AND l.deleted=false #order_by#

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include

param.name: intersects
param.description: Geometry to filter to locations intersecting with as WKT, Web Mercator projection
param.where: st_intersects(l.boundary_geom, st_geomfromtext('#intersects#', 900913)) and not st_touches(l.boundary_geom, st_geomfromtext('#intersects#', 900913))

param.name: parent_id
param.description: ID of the parent site to filter to
